MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:22pm. Our engineers have arrived in Broompark Street to investigate reports of third party damage to our electrical network our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:08pm on Monday, 26 October 2020
